projects.title: ZiiM's CRM
projects.description: This site is built using Next.Js, TRPC, NextAuth, Prisma, and Chakra-UI. My goal for the site was to build my own version of Trello and how I think it should be used. It has joinable groups for easy sharing of tasks and todos. SITE IS STILL *WIP*

projects.title: Github Tasks
projects.description: It's a simple site built using Next.JS, NextAuth, TRPC, and TailwindCSS. Its goal is to create todos and tasks for specific GitHub repositories and share them with all repository members.

projects.title: Zurl - Easy URL shortner
projects.description: Zurl is built using Next.Js, TRPC, TailwindCSS. It's a very simple URL shorter using VercelEdge to quickly route to the correct URL.

projects.title: nextJSCrud
projects.description: nextJSCrud is a simple todo app built using NodeJS, NextJS, Expres and MongoDB stack. Its a very simple project that I was using to re-learn/ touch up on my skills with full-stack development
